alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 3:28PM EST until December 19 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Occasional snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches expected. * WHERE...Hamilton County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow covered roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The lake effect snow will occasionally impact western Hamilton County Sunday morning mainly north of Route 28 and the towns of Inlet and Raquette Lake. The snowband may then shift southward during the afternoon. The snowband may oscillate north of Route 28 early Sunday evening before shifting southward overnight into Monday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
